Plot: Sandra, a young Belgian mother, discovers that her workmates have opted for a significant pay bonus, in exchange for her dismissal. She has only one weekend to convince her colleagues to give up their bonuses so that she can keep her job.
Title: Two Days, One Night
Actors: Marion Cotillard, Fabrizio Rongione, Catherine Salée, Batiste Sornin
tomatoConsensus: Another profoundly affecting work from the Dardenne brothers, Two Days, One Night delivers its timely message with honesty and clear-eyed compassion.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 38 wins & 73 nominations.
